Celeron wondered what Hellplague was doing with the computer, but it
didn't=
 concern him, so he continued with his work.

His first step in accessing t=
he damage would be to see how deep the
ship had been buried.  Since it was =
not a huge ship, Celeron didn't
think it would be too deeply buried.  He th=
en determined what type of
soil/rock was under the ship.  After that he beg=
an inspecting the
actual damage to the ship...

OOC: Could someone respond =
to Celeron's work, possibly give a
description of the condition of the ship=
?
